General.Name: JASTECH Ltd
General.Description: JASTECH, Ltd. manufactures and sells semiconductor equipment. It offers display module mounting, laser, refresh, and plating equipment, as well as develops FPD inspection equipment and motion recognition solutions. The company was formerly known as ASTJETEC Co. Ltd. and changed its name to JASTECH, Ltd. in December 2015. JASTECH, Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.

2.Name: Tae-Sang  Hwang
2.Title: Chief of Research Center and Managing Director

4.Name: Mr. Ki-Yeol  Choi
4.Title: VP, Director of Semiconductor Equipment Division and Director
